title: Remove a listing from your lost items list
description: Hides a listing from the lost items list.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to hide.

returns.description: <HideMyTradeMeResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful. Note that this operation will only report failure if the listing still exists in the lost items list after the operation completes. In all other cases, this API will report success (for example it will report success if the listing ID is invalid or the listing has already been removed).

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
